code: @Override protected RestChannelConsumer prepareRequest(RestRequest restRequest, NodeClient client) {     String index = restRequest.param(INDEX.getPreferredName()).     IndicesOptions options = IndicesOptions.fromRequest(restRequest, IndicesOptions.STRICT_EXPAND_OPEN_FORBID_CLOSED).     GetRollupIndexCapsAction.Request request = new GetRollupIndexCapsAction.Request(Strings.splitStringByCommaToArray(index), options).     return channel -> client.execute(GetRollupIndexCapsAction.INSTANCE, request, new RestToXContentListener<>(channel)). }
